title: File Path Handling in Golang
description: In this lab, you will explore the usage of the `filepath` package in Go to perform various operations on file paths, including constructing portable paths, splitting paths into directory and file components, checking path absoluteness, finding file extensions, and determining relative paths between two paths.

meta.title: Golang File Paths | Portable Path Operations
